meanings.definition: A bag used for carrying tools or materials for work.
meanings.sent1: My dad always carries his workbag to the construction site.
meanings.sent2: She packed her workbag with a hammer, nails, and measuring tape.
meanings.sent3: The workbag decided to take a break and refused to carry any more tools.
meanings.sent4: Her workbag was a trusty companion, always ready to lend a helping hand.
meanings.sent5: The bright red workbag stood out among the sea of toolboxes.

meanings.definition: To put tools or materials into a bag for work.
meanings.sent1: I workbag my tools every morning before heading to the construction site.
meanings.sent2: He workbags his supplies efficiently to save time on the job.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel workbags nuts in its tiny workbag for the winter.
meanings.sent4: She workbags her creativity in a colorful workbag, ready to unleash it at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The chef workbags the fresh ingredients, ensuring a delicious meal every time.
